text: Yabona! Abo bangakholwayo bathi besakuba nenkukhumalo nekratshi, inkukhumalo yemihla yokungazi, Yena uAllâh Wathulula ukuthozama phezu koMthunywa waKhe naphezu kwamakholwa, wayalela phezu kwawo ilizwi lokwenziwa kokulungileyo, yaye ayefanelekile lilo ilizwi elo yaye uAllâh nguSolwazi wezinto zonke
